N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 49.6 - Handling, penning, loading facilities

State Regulations

Facilities used for handling, penning or loading livestock
at or in any livestock auction building shall be constructed in such manner as
to permit proper cleaning and disinfecting thereof and so as not to expose
livestock to physical injury, bruising or harm. Ramps, alleyways, pens and all
unloading, loading and holding facilities shall be constructed and maintained
in a safe manner. Every livestock auction building shall be so constructed that
livestock consigned for replacement will be kept separate and apart from all
other livestock therein. Notes
